name: DevOps Engineer (Vietnam)
description:
About us: We are an international FinTech holding operating in Europe, the US, Asia, Latin America and the CIS. We are building a team which will create exclusive IT products to support fintech businesses with flexibility, simplicity, AI and deep analytics.

Projects overview:

  • Decision-making engine. Product for risk managers and antifraud strategy makers. We are developing a system based on Kogito, which is the main framework for business rules and processes in our project. Kotlin is used to implement business logic and microservices managed in Kubernetes.
  • Marketing automation platform. Product for CRM managers, simple UI, and advanced AI. This product is also based on microservices, and technology stack is Python and FastAPI.
  • Data Lakehouse. Core for data analytics. Technology stack is Apache Airflow, Apache Spark, MS SQL. Also Implementing new tech for Data Science and Information security.

Our team is looking for DevOps engineer. This position requires long-term relocation to our office in Ho Chi Minh City in Vietnam.

Responsibilities:

  • Maintain, support, develop cloud infrastructure in AWS.
  • Administer virtual servers and MS SQL, PostgreSQL databases.
  • Maintain, support, develop CI/CD pipelines.
  • Automate routine administration tasks.
  • Design, develop, and implement infrastructure automation solutions using IaC tools.
  • Managing Kubernetes clusters.
  • Configuring monitoring tools: Zabbix, Grafana, Prometheus.

Required skills:

  • Higher education is a must (required for Work permit in Vietnam).
  • Know how to write Docker file, build image and send it to registry.
  • Know the difference between DaemonSet and StatefulSet in Kubernetes.
  • Experience with AWS – VPC, EC2, EKS.
  • Experience with Terraform (preferably with AWS provider).
  • Know how to write a script on bash for CI/CD.
  • Ready to relocate to Ho Chi Minh City in Vietnam.

What you will have with us:

  • Transparent engagement and motivation.
  • No bureaucracy, ability to implement changes quickly.
  • Participate in team building events across Southeast Asia.
  • Become part of a business family of highly skilled and highly engaged professionals with clear ideology and vision.
  • Full coverage of relocation and legalization process, cozy office in a modern area, company trainings and much more.
